data.text: @james_e_b_ He is also an expert in geo-political warfare,foreign policies and Ukranian affairs.

@james_e_b_ @CDCgov Fully agree. Obesity has already increased tremendously over the past 2 years & makes them vulnerable - might have already now contributed to early death. chase one evil with another …

@KrischanWolf @CDCgov Oh yes, lots of other health problems in the short and medium term. Was just thinking that, eventually, that obesity is going to make them high risk for covid too, unless it's been completely tamed by vaccines and/or evolution at that point
@james_e_b_ @CDCgov Diabetes will Kick in earlier than 60 … and much more.

@KrischanWolf @CDCgov Agreed. The rise in child obesity in UK is absolutely shocking. Not relevant to covid now as kids have such a low risk to begin with, but if they're not able to reverse the obesity and it's still there when they hit 60...

@james_e_b_ You can possibly say very justified that his posts have increased C19 mortality and morbidity. Anxiety is a major risk factor. Next one after age and obesity: @CDCgov data.

https://t.co/lA4yqoVnre
@james_e_b_ When the history of big tech censorship is written the question will be why was he allowed to stay on twitter while other charlatans were deplatformed.

@gasman_al Somehow his takes on this are even worse. Measuring the suffering of "commoners" by the length of the queues for the subway
https://t.co/pbloVbds5P
@james_e_b_ He seems to have pivoted to being a Russo-Ukrainian military affairs expert these days...
